mapper.select:
select id,`name`,buildingId,floor,`number`,`position`,category,nature,peopleNum,linkman, phone,operator,expenses,expirationDate,bandwidth,serviceType,status,legal,lineNum,lineType, lineOpenDate,lineStatus,groupCode,groupGrade,userId,`type`,longitude,latitude,ctime, expensesName,orderTime,memberRole,memberRoleRealNum,memberExpensesName from tb_consumer where 1=1
and buildingId in
#{item}
and userId in
#{item}
and `name` like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by id desc
select count(1) from tb_consumer where buildingId=#{buildingId}
